Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION
REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION

Title: Relates to temporary release eligibility for judicially ordered comprehensive alcohol and substance abuse treatment
Summary: Relates to temporary release eligibility for judicially ordered comprehensive alcohol and substance abuse treatment.
LawCode: Amd §851, Cor L; amd §60.04, Pen L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the correction law and the penal law, in relation to temporary release eligibility for judicially ordered comprehensive alcohol and substance abuse treatment
